CustomField.description: If no to the previous question, have you been diagnosed with the following? (TIER 5)
CustomField.label: Tier-5 Injury Matrix

value.fullName: Neurological effects (delayed reaction times problems with short-term memory, visual perception, attention, and color vision)
value.label: Neurological effects (delayed reaction times problems with short-term memory, visual perception, attention, and color vision)

value.fullName: Neurobehavioral performance deficits (i.e., delayed recall and deficits in visual perception), decreased blink reflex, and mood effects (i.e., confusion, depression and tension)
value.label: Neurobehavioral performance deficits (i.e., delayed recall and deficits in visual perception), decreased blink reflex, and mood effects (i.e., confusion, depression and tension)

value.fullName: Severe tooth decay or dental related issues
value.label: Severe tooth decay or dental related issues
